about the late singer 考拉桑:

The production team had already identified a role for 考拉桑 and assigned him tasks, but soon after the news came that 考拉桑 had died. The production team intended to use the received material to remedy the problem, but the received material was watermarked and could not be used. Therefore, there was no actual performance of 考拉桑 in this work. However, in order to pray for the blessing and leave a place for it, the position of 考拉桑 in the voice actor list was reserved, and the agreement of the voice actor was obtained later. I hope all players and fans of 考拉桑 understand.
